metadata.title: CVE-2021-21809 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: A command execution vulnerability exists in the default legacy spellcheckerplugin in Moodle 3.10. A specially crafted series of HTTP requests can leadto command execution. An attacker must have administrator privileges toexploit this vulnerabilities.

criterions.comment: moodle package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
